data.title: Family and Community Medicine
data.text:
Brooklyn Anderson, MD

Hometown: Devine, TX

Medical School: Texas Tech University Health Sciences Center

Favorite Thing About UT Health San Antonio: How great the care that is provided for patients here! It makes me excited to be part of such a great team of friendly residents, faculty, & staff.

Fun Fact/Hobby: I love having lots of plants and collecting vinyl records.

Cersten Bradley, MD

Hometown: Euless, TX

Medical School: Universidad Autonoma de Guadalajara

Favorite Thing About UT Health San Antonio: The people here always make me feel at home! Whether I’m working in the hospital or exploring the city, I can count on being surrounded by positive energy.

Fun Fact/Hobby: My favorite color is green because my birthday is St. Patrick’s Day. And I used to be a Dallas Cowboys Cheerleader ✭, Go Cowboys!

Erika Erickson, MD

Hometown: Canton, Texas

Medical School: Ross University School of Medicine

Favorite Thing About UT Health San Antonio: I admire how open and welcoming the faculty, staff, and residents are. You do not feel alone and are given the tools and resources in order to succeed. You feel like a member of the team from day one!

Fun Fact/Hobby: I lived in three different international countries throughout the first two years of medical school. My hobbies include anything and everything outdoors! I love hiking, camping, swimming, and fishing in my canoe alongside my Labrador Retriever named Jewels. I am an avid cacti and succulent collector, and I also enjoy decorating my humble abode with painting abstract art for fun.

Madeline Hazle, MD

Medical school: UT Health San Antonio Long School of Medicine

Favorite thing about UT Health San Antonio: The people! Everyone in the program is so friendly and supportive of each other – it truly feels like a family. They also care deeply about serving the San Antonio community and are committed to providing quality patient care.

Fun fact/hobby: I was a member of the swim team at the University of Wisconsin!

Alice Kim, MD

Hometown: Duluth, GA

Medical School: Medical University of South Carolina

Favorite Thing About UT Health San Antonio: Too early to know for sure but love how diversity is not just a word on a brochure but valued and recruited – half of faculty are women and a third from minority background!

Fun Fact/Hobby: I’ve hiked along llamas in Cusco. If you want to talk about where to travel next, I’m your gal.

Valerie Lopez, MD

Hometown: Edinburg, TX

Medical School: Texas Tech University Health Sciences Center Paul L. Foster School of Medicine

Favorite Thing About UT Health San Antonio: The supportive environment and kind-hearted people all found in a bustling city with seemingly endless opportunities for growth and personal development

Fun Fact/Hobby: I play the viola and enjoy jamming out to classical music!

Gwendolyn Quintana, MD

Hometown: San Antonio, Texas

Medical School: Universidad Autonoma de Guadalajara

Favorite Thing About UT Health San Antonio: The people that make the team.

Fun Fact/Hobby: Just before starting residency, I completed the Camino de Santiago, an 800km trek from St. Jean Pied de Port, France, through the Pyrenees, to the most western tip of Spain over the course of 30 days.

Gabriel Rheiner, MD

Hometown: Boerne, TX

Medical School: UT Health San Antonio

Favorite Thing About UT Health San Antonio: The eagerness, not just willingness, that everyone has to help you however they can!

Fun Fact/Hobby: I enjoy hiking and biking, and my wife and I have a 1 year old dog named Bonnie!

Neil Sood, DO

Hometown: Jacksonville, Florida

Medical School: Nova Southeastern University Kiran C. Patel College of Osteopathic Medicine

Favorite Thing About UT Health San Antonio: The support of our faculty, seniors, and staff in developing us into competent and compassionate physicians is unlike anything I have ever imagined. There is never a moment where you feel you are on your own or can’t ask for help, and this environment is fundamental for our personal and professional growth.

Fun Fact/Hobby: I love playing board games and spending time with friends. Fun fact is that I dislike Disney World!
